trial_identification.studytitle: American-Australian-African Trial With Dronedarone in Patients With Atrial Fibrillation or Atrial Flutter for the Maintenance of Sinus Rhythm
trial_identification.scientifictitle: American-Australian-African Trial With Dronedarone in Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter Patients for the Maintenance of Sinus Rhythm (ADONIS)

interventions.interventions:
Treatment: drugs - Dronedarone (SR33589) Treatment: drugs - placebo
Experimental: Dronedarone 400mg bid - dronedarone 400mg tablets
Experimental: Placebo - matching placebo tablets
Treatment: drugs: Dronedarone (SR33589) oral administration
Treatment: drugs: placebo oral administration

primaryOutcome.outcome: The primary endpoint of the study is the time from randomisation to first documented AF/AFL recurrence

secondaryOutcome.outcome: - AF/AFL related symptoms collected at the time of ECG/TTEM recording,
- mean ventricular rate during AF/AFL at first recorded AF/AFL recurrence (12-lead ECG or TTEM)
- time from presumed study drug near steady state defined as D5 midnight to first documented AF/AFL recurrence as indicated by ECG/TTEM recording.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: - Patients of either sex aged 21 years or more, in sinus rhythm for at least 1 hour at the time of randomisation and with at least one ECG-documented AF/AFL episode in the last 3 months.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria:
- MAIN CRITERIA (non-exhaustive list, see protocol for details):
Women of childbearing potential without adequate birth control, Pregnant women, Breastfeeding women, Congestive heart failure NYHA class III or IV, Conditions which increase the risk of severe antiarrhythmic drug side effects, Severe associated conditions.

recruitment.hospital: sanofi-aventis Australia administrative office - Macquarie Park

ethicsAndSummary.summary:
To assess the efficacy of dronedarone versus placebo for the maintenance of normal sinus rhythm after electrical, pharmacological or spontaneous conversion of atrial fibrillation/atrial flutter (AF/AFL).
To assess the efficacy of dronedarone versus placebo on ventricular rate control in case of AF/AFL recurrence.
To assess the efficacy of dronedarone versus placebo on AF/AFL-related symptoms.
